img_above_text:
# Frostsprout Twig
The Frostsprout Twig Curios item in Black Myth: Wukong can be found within Chapter 3 of the game. While well-hidden, you will want to pick this up as it is locked behind a secret boss that will open additional areas in the Pagoda Realm.
With the Frostsprout Twig equipped, your Chill resistance is moderately increased, which is incredibly useful in The New West, especially in the locations after you find this Curios item.

img_summary: The image displays the equipment menu from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically highlighting the "Frostsprout Twig" Curios item. The Frostsprout Twig is a rare item that moderately increases Chill resistance, which is beneficial in certain game areas. The preceding text indicates that this item is found in Chapter 3 and is hidden behind a secret boss, unlocking additional areas in the Pagoda Realm.
